DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : Babies bear term elective caesarean section ( CS ) onset labor likely develop respiratory complication baby bear vaginally . In develop country resource scarce difficult provide expensive treatment neonatal care . Aim Work : To assess effect prophylactic dexamethasone administration elective cesarean section term reduce neonatal respiratory complication . Patients method : 600 woman include study plan elective caesarean section . 300 receive dexamethasone 12 mg twice , 12 hour apart 48 hour delivery . 300 patient control group . The outcome : incidence admission neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) , incidence transient tachypnea newborn ( TTN ) , incidence respiratory distress syndrome ( RDS ) need mechanical ventilation .
DOC.brief_title: Dexamethasone Prevention Respiratory Morbidity Elective Caesarean Section Term Fetus
DOC.detailed_description: Dexamethasone long act corticosteroid use prior elective cesarean section decrease neonatal respiratory morbidity enhacing fetal lung maturity .
DOC.criteria: Previous caesarean section Complete 37 week calculate first day last menstrual period . Obstetric complication preeclampsia , antepartum hemorrhage know fetal anomaly . Hypertensive patient . Chronic disease e.g . diabetes mellitus . Known renal disease . Preoperative infection .
